long_description: The 3-season, 4-person Ticla Mojave 4 Tent loves festivals, family adventures, camping trips-any outing that requires a good sized shelter that will still fit in a limited-size campsite. A small tent you can stand up in, this shelter is perfect for campers who are looking for a little extra height without a massive footprint. Rainfly provides excellent coverage without compromising views or ventilation. Strong and smooth shock-corded aluminum poles withstand the elements. Tent, fly and floor materials are tough enough for kids and pets. Stakes are heavy and durable. Fits in a 10 x 15 ft. space, making it perfect for festivals and small campsites. Innovative storage tote makes it easy to unpack and repack the tent-no more tedious stuffing! The Ticla Mojave 4 Tent comes with a rainfly, pole set, stakes, guylines and tote bag.
short_description: The 3-season, 4-person Ticla Mojave 4 Tent loves festivals, family adventures, camping trips-any outing that requires a good sized shelter that will still fit in a limited-size campsite.
